metadata.description: Roofing catalog expansion - Phase 1 Priority items

items.description: Premium designer shingle per square, enhanced curb appeal

items.description: Class 4 impact resistant shingle, insurance discount eligible

items.description: Energy Star cool roof shingle, reflective granules

items.description: GAF Timberline Solar shingle per square, integrated PV

items.description: Synthetic underlayment, 10 squares per roll, walkable

items.description: Self-adhering ice/water membrane, 2 squares per roll

items.description: Starter strip shingles, 120 LF per bundle

items.description: Hip and ridge cap shingles, 33 LF per bundle

items.description: Polyiso roof insulation 2", 4x8 board, R-12

items.description: Tapered insulation system per square, positive drainage

items.description: Pipe flashing boot 3", rubber and aluminum

items.description: Ridge vent 4ft section, shingle-over style

items.description: Commercial roof drain 4", cast iron, dome strainer

items.name: Roof Hatch 30x36
items.description: Roof access hatch 30"x36", steel, insulated

items.description: Commercial roof inspection with core sample option

items.description: Minor roof leak repair, single penetration

items.description: Major roof leak repair, multiple areas or deck damage

items.description: Emergency roof tarping, storm damage protection

items.description: Xactimate insurance estimate, included with job

items.name: Insurance Supplement Filing
items.description: Insurance supplement documentation and filing

notes: Solar shingle integration with GAF Timberline Solar
Insurance services (Xactimate, supplements) included at no charge - builds into job margin
Impact resistant shingles qualify for insurance discounts in hail-prone areas
Commercial insulation priced per board for accurate takeoff
